Class RewardResponse

java.lang.Object
com.FeedEmGreens.HealthyAura.dto.RewardResponse
public class RewardResponse extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the result of a successful reward redemption.

This class encapsulates details about a user’s reward redemption, including which reward was redeemed, how many points were used, how many remain, and a confirmation message.

It is typically returned by the RewardsController after a user redeems a reward through the /rewards/me/redeem-reward/{rewardId} endpoint.

Example JSON response:

{
  "username": "johnDoe",
  "rewardName": "Free Healthy Drink",
  "description": "Redeem a sugar-free drink at participating hawker stalls.",
  "pointsUsed": 100,
  "pointsLeft": 450,
  "message": "Reward redeemed successfully!"
}
Since:
2025-11-07
Version:
1.0

    • RewardResponse

      public RewardResponse(String username, String rewardName, String description, int pointsUsed, int pointsLeft, String message)
      Constructs a new RewardResponse with full redemption details.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      rewardName - the name of the redeemed reward
      description - a short description of the reward
      pointsUsed - the number of points deducted
      pointsLeft - the remaining points after redemption
      message - a confirmation message
